Episode Title: "ChatGPT: The New Supplement to Your Evening Routine"

Are you tired of waking up feeling groggy and unprepared for the day ahead? Do you struggle with difficult conversations or situations that require you to think outside the box? Well, you're not alone. The answer is yes, ChatGPT!

ChatGPT is a large language model created by Anthropic that can answer a wide range of questions and provide insights on various topics. It can be used for a variety of purposes, including research, writing, and even managing your personal and professional life.
